snippet: Pope Francis needs to hold accountable the bishops who covered up sexual abuse by priests, and a good place to start is the St. Paul-Minneapolis archdiocese.
abstract: Editorial urges Pope Francis to hold bishops like St Paul-Minneapolis Archbishop John Nienstedt accountable for covering up sexual abuse by priests; highlights Nienstedt's poor handling of pedophilia scandal, under fire from all sides.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis needs to hold accountable the bishops who covered up sexual abuse by priests, and a good place to start is the St. Paul-Minneapolis archdiocese.

headline.seo: Pope Francis and the Bishops Who Hid Pedophile Priests
